    1: import numpy as np
    2: 
    3: nd1 = np.array([[1, 2], [3, 4]])
    4: 
    5: # reshape
    6: nd1.reshape(4)
    7: nd1.reshape(2, 2)
    8: nd1.reshape((2, 2))
    9: 
   10: nd1.reshape((2, 2), order="C")
   11: nd1.reshape(4, order="C")
   12: 
   13: # resize
   14: nd1.resize()
   15: nd1.resize(4)
   16: nd1.resize(2, 2)
   17: nd1.resize((2, 2))
   18: 
   19: nd1.resize((2, 2), refcheck=True)
   20: nd1.resize(4, refcheck=True)
   21: 
   22: nd2 = np.array([[1, 2], [3, 4]])
   23: 
   24: # transpose
   25: nd2.transpose()
   26: nd2.transpose(1, 0)
   27: nd2.transpose((1, 0))
   28: 
   29: # swapaxes
   30: nd2.swapaxes(0, 1)
   31: 
   32: # flatten
   33: nd2.flatten()
   34: nd2.flatten("C")
   35: 
   36: # ravel
   37: nd2.ravel()
   38: nd2.ravel("C")
   39: 
   40: # squeeze
   41: nd2.squeeze()
   42: 
   43: nd3 = np.array([[1, 2]])
   44: nd3.squeeze(0)
   45: 
   46: nd4 = np.array([[[1, 2]]])
   47: nd4.squeeze((0, 1))
